title: Can't Hit PLAY bUTTON at home screen, Can't See Characters at Character Select-- RIOT PLZ HELP**
body:
Just had an issue where I couldn't hit the PLAY button to start a match. Resolved after I reset 3 times. Then once I got into a match, at character select during my turn I could see NO CHARACTERS and was forced out of the match. 

Anyone else having these issues?

replies.body:
go to your preferences under C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open the LCULocalPreferences.YAML file in notepad. Change the value for         ZoomScale: 1.500000 to ZoomScale: 1.000000  and save (dont change the filetype from .YAML)

i dont work for riot, but i doubt you'd get a response from them this year.

LMK if this worked for you.

It sounds like a possible corruption with your game files while installing.  Is this happening on the updated client?  If so, what happens if you try this in the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Do you still have missing champions or issues hitting Play?  Let me know!
